segments.text: December the fifteenth . The day after tomorrow is little Tom ’ s birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . What present should we give him this time ? By the way , how old is he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thirteen today and tomorrow . Fourteen the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How time flies ! He ’ s a big boy now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And don ’ t forget Mary , Tom ’ s twin sister . It ’ s her birthday , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Let ’ s invite all their little friends to come and celebrate .
segments.speaker: S1
